name: Deer Hunter UE5
description:
Left Click - Fire
Right Click - Aim
Mouse Wheel - Zoom In/Out
Q/E - Lean
WASD - Move
R - Reload
Hold Shift - Sprint
Hold Tab - Highlight nearby animal tracks
Alt+F4 - Exit game

Note: It takes maybe 30 seconds to finish loading everything. I didn't bother implementing a loading screen.
